bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: An African American fraternal organization, the Grand Court, I. O. of Calanthe, Knights of Pythias, was headquartered in Richmond Virginia's Jackson Ward.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a parade badge for the Grand Court, I. O. of Calanthe, Knights of Pythias, an African American fraternal organization in Richmond, Virginia. The badge reads "Grand Court, I. O. of Calanthe, under jurisdiction K. of P., N. A., S. A., E., A., A. & A." It features a wire gilt braid and blue, green and white stripes. Parade badge, of Richmond Virginia's Jackson Ward.
